attributes.action: Ban Go Compare from using that song and that man for their advertising!
attributes.background: We all hate the song, go compare is a great website used by many, but the advertising is driving everybody insane and they know it. They advertise on nearly every radio station and tv channel and we want it to stop before it pushes somebody over the edge.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament don't directly control which specific adverts are shown on TV.

The Advertising Standards Authority looks at complaints about advertisements. You can find out more about making a complaint to the ASA here:

https://www.asa.org.uk/
